items.title: Here’s How LinkedIn Co-Founder Reid Hoffman Says AI Needs to Be Regulated
items.description: Reid Hoffman spoke with Inc. on the heels of Demo Day in San Francisco, a pitch competition from Entrepreneurs First.

items.title: There’s a Right Way to Reject Job Applicants, and It Helps Your Long-Term Hiring Strategy
items.description: If you’re thoughtful when you say no, a near-miss job candidate may consider reapplying at your company for other positions.

items.title: Steal Citigroup’s AI Training Rule to Ensure Successful Adoption at Your Company
items.description: When it comes to deploying artificial intelligence at your business, take a lesson from the global bank’s approach.

items.title: Research Shows That Political Talk Is Tanking Workplace Harmony. Here’s How Leaders Can Fix It
items.description: A new survey shows a large majority of employees are uncomfortable with political discussions on the job and want them excluded from the workplace.

items.title: Apple’s F1 Deal Includes Something I Didn’t Expect. It Makes Perfect Sense
items.description: The deal brings the world’s fastest-growing sport to Apple’s platforms—some of it for free.
